suites.name: Standard Suite
suites.description: Common terms that most applications should support

parameters.name: using
parameters.description: the application file to open the object with

parameters.name: with properties
parameters.description: the initial values for the properties, to be included with the open command sent to the application that opens the direct object

parameters.name: with properties
parameters.description: optional properties to be included with the print command sent to the application that prints the direct object

commands.name: activate
commands.description: Activate the specified window (or the Finder)

directParameter.name: direct-parameter
directParameter.description: the window to activate (if not specified, activates the Finder)

commands.name: count
commands.description: Return the number of elements of a particular class within an object

parameters.name: each
parameters.description: the class of the elements to be counted

directParameter.name: direct-parameter
directParameter.description: the object whose elements are to be counted

commands.name: data size
commands.description: Return the size in bytes of an object

parameters.name: as
parameters.description: the data type for which the size is calculated

directParameter.name: direct-parameter
directParameter.description: the object whose data size is to be returned

commands.name: delete
commands.description: Move an item from its container to the trash

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: the new location for the object(s)

parameters.name: replacing
parameters.description: Specifies whether or not to replace items in the destination that have the same name as items being duplicated

parameters.name: routing suppressed
parameters.description: Specifies whether or not to autoroute items (default is false). Only applies when copying to the system folder.

parameters.name: exact copy
parameters.description: Specifies whether or not to copy permissions/ownership as is

parameters.name: new
parameters.description: the class of the new element

parameters.name: at
parameters.description: the location at which to insert the element

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: when creating an alias file, the original item to create an alias to or when creating a file viewer window, the target of the window

parameters.name: with properties
parameters.description: the initial values for the properties of the element

commands.name: move
commands.description: Move object(s) to a new location

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: the new location for the object(s)

parameters.name: replacing
parameters.description: Specifies whether or not to replace items in the destination that have the same name as items being moved

parameters.name: positioned at
parameters.description: Gives a list (in local window coordinates) of positions for the destination items

parameters.name: routing suppressed
parameters.description: Specifies whether or not to autoroute items (default is false). Only applies when moving to the system folder.

suites.name: Finder Basics
suites.description: Commonly-used Finder commands and object classes

commands.name: openVirtualLocation
commands.description: Private event to open a virtual location

commands.name: copy
commands.description: (NOT AVAILABLE YET) Copy the selected items to the clipboard (the Finder must be the front application)

commands.name: sort
commands.description: Return the specified object(s) in a sorted list

parameters.name: by
parameters.description: the property to sort the items by (name, index, date, etc.)

directParameter.name: direct-parameter
directParameter.description: a list of finder objects to sort

properties.name: clipboard
properties.description: (NOT AVAILABLE YET) the Finder’s clipboard window

properties.name: name
properties.description: the Finder’s name

properties.name: visible
properties.description: Is the Finder’s layer visible?

properties.name: frontmost
properties.description: Is the Finder the frontmost process?

properties.name: selection
properties.description: the selection in the frontmost Finder window

properties.name: insertion location
properties.description: the container in which a new folder would appear if “New Folder” was selected

properties.name: product version
properties.description: the version of the System software running on this computer

properties.name: version
properties.description: the version of the Finder

properties.name: startup disk
properties.description: the startup disk

properties.name: desktop
properties.description: the desktop

properties.name: trash
properties.description: the trash

properties.name: home
properties.description: the home directory

properties.name: computer container
properties.description: the computer location (as in Go > Computer)

properties.name: Finder preferences
properties.description: Various preferences that apply to the Finder as a whole

suites.name: Finder items
suites.description: Commands used with file system items, and basic item definition

commands.name: clean up
commands.description: Arrange items in window nicely (only applies to open windows in icon view that are not kept arranged)

parameters.name: by
parameters.description: the order in which to clean up the objects (name, index, date, etc.)

parameters.name: security
parameters.description: (obsolete)

directParameter.name: direct-parameter
directParameter.description: “empty” and “empty trash” both do the same thing

commands.name: reveal
commands.description: Bring the specified object(s) into view

directParameter.name: direct-parameter
directParameter.description: the object to be made visible

commands.name: update
commands.description: Update the display of the specified object(s) to match their on-disk representation

parameters.name: necessity
parameters.description: only update if necessary (i.e. a finder window is open). default is false

parameters.name: registering applications
parameters.description: register applications. default is true

properties.name: name
properties.description: the name of the item

properties.name: displayed name
properties.description: the user-visible name of the item

properties.name: name extension
properties.description: the name extension of the item (such as “txt”)

properties.name: extension hidden
properties.description: Is the item's extension hidden from the user?

properties.name: index
properties.description: the index in the front-to-back ordering within its container

properties.name: container
properties.description: the container of the item

properties.name: disk
properties.description: the disk on which the item is stored

properties.name: position
properties.description: the position of the item within its parent window (can only be set for an item in a window viewed as icons or buttons)

properties.name: desktop position
properties.description: the position of the item on the desktop

properties.name: bounds
properties.description: the bounding rectangle of the item (can only be set for an item in a window viewed as icons or buttons)

properties.name: label index
properties.description: the label of the item

properties.name: locked
properties.description: Is the file locked?

properties.name: kind
properties.description: the kind of the item

properties.name: description
properties.description: a description of the item

properties.name: comment
properties.description: the comment of the item, displayed in the “Get Info” window

properties.name: size
properties.description: the logical size of the item

properties.name: physical size
properties.description: the actual space used by the item on disk

properties.name: creation date
properties.description: the date on which the item was created

properties.name: modification date
properties.description: the date on which the item was last modified

properties.name: icon
properties.description: the icon bitmap of the item

properties.name: URL
properties.description: the URL of the item

properties.name: owner
properties.description: the user that owns the container

properties.name: group
properties.description: the user or group that has special access to the container

properties.name: information window
properties.description: the information window for the item

properties.name: properties
properties.description: every property of an item

properties.name: class
properties.description: the class of the item

suites.name: Containers and folders
suites.description: Classes that can contain other file system items

classes.name: container
classes.description: An item that contains other items

properties.name: entire contents
properties.description: the entire contents of the container, including the contents of its children

properties.name: expandable
properties.description: (NOT AVAILABLE YET) Is the container capable of being expanded as an outline?

properties.name: expanded
properties.description: (NOT AVAILABLE YET) Is the container opened as an outline? (can only be set for containers viewed as lists)

properties.name: completely expanded
properties.description: (NOT AVAILABLE YET) Are the container and all of its children opened as outlines? (can only be set for containers viewed as lists)

properties.name: container window
properties.description: the container window for this folder

classes.name: computer-object
classes.description: the Computer location (as in Go > Computer)

properties.name: id
properties.description: the unique id for this disk (unchanged while disk remains connected and Finder remains running)

properties.name: capacity
properties.description: the total number of bytes (free or used) on the disk

properties.name: free space
properties.description: the number of free bytes left on the disk

properties.name: ejectable
properties.description: Can the media be ejected (floppies, CDs, and so on)?

properties.name: local volume
properties.description: Is the media a local volume (as opposed to a file server)?

properties.name: startup
properties.description: Is this disk the boot disk?

properties.name: format
properties.description: the filesystem format of this disk

properties.name: journaling enabled
properties.description: Does this disk do file system journaling?

properties.name: ignore privileges
properties.description: Ignore permissions on this disk?

classes.name: desktop-object
classes.description: Desktop-object is the class of the “desktop” object

classes.name: trash-object
classes.description: Trash-object is the class of the “trash” object

properties.name: warns before emptying
properties.description: Display a dialog when emptying the trash?

properties.name: file type
properties.description: the OSType identifying the type of data contained in the item

properties.name: creator type
properties.description: the OSType identifying the application that created the item

properties.name: stationery
properties.description: Is the file a stationery pad?

properties.name: product version
properties.description: the version of the product (visible at the top of the “Get Info” window)

properties.name: version
properties.description: the version of the file (visible at the bottom of the “Get Info” window)

properties.name: original item
properties.description: the original item pointed to by the alias

properties.name: id
properties.description: the bundle identifier or creator type of the application

properties.name: suggested size
properties.description: (AVAILABLE IN 10.1 TO 10.4) the memory size with which the developer recommends the application be launched

properties.name: minimum size
properties.description: (AVAILABLE IN 10.1 TO 10.4) the smallest memory size with which the application can be launched

properties.name: preferred size
properties.description: (AVAILABLE IN 10.1 TO 10.4) the memory size with which the application will be launched

properties.name: accepts high level events
properties.description: Is the application high-level event aware? (OBSOLETE: always returns true)

properties.name: has scripting terminology
properties.description: Does the process have a scripting terminology, i.e., can it be scripted?

properties.name: opens in Classic
properties.description: (AVAILABLE IN 10.1 TO 10.4) Should the application launch in the Classic environment?

classes.name: internet location file
classes.description: A file containing an internet location

properties.name: location
properties.description: the internet location

properties.name: clipping window
properties.description: (NOT AVAILABLE YET) the clipping window for this clipping

properties.name: id
properties.description: the unique id for this window

properties.name: position
properties.description: the upper left position of the window

properties.name: bounds
properties.description: the boundary rectangle for the window

properties.name: titled
properties.description: Does the window have a title bar?

properties.name: name
properties.description: the name of the window

properties.name: index
properties.description: the number of the window in the front-to-back layer ordering

properties.name: closeable
properties.description: Does the window have a close box?

properties.name: floating
properties.description: Does the window have a title bar?

properties.name: modal
properties.description: Is the window modal?

properties.name: resizable
properties.description: Is the window resizable?

properties.name: zoomable
properties.description: Is the window zoomable?

properties.name: zoomed
properties.description: Is the window zoomed?

properties.name: visible
properties.description: Is the window visible (always true for open Finder windows)?

properties.name: collapsed
properties.description: Is the window collapsed

properties.name: properties
properties.description: every property of a window

properties.name: target
properties.description: the container at which this file viewer is targeted

properties.name: current view
properties.description: the current view for the container window

properties.name: icon view options
properties.description: the icon view options for the container window

properties.name: list view options
properties.description: the list view options for the container window

properties.name: column view options
properties.description: the column view options for the container window

properties.name: toolbar visible
properties.description: Is the window's toolbar visible?

properties.name: statusbar visible
properties.description: Is the window's status bar visible?

properties.name: pathbar visible
properties.description: Is the window's path bar visible?

properties.name: sidebar width
properties.description: the width of the sidebar for the container window

properties.name: item
properties.description: the item from which this window was opened

properties.name: current panel
properties.description: the current panel in the information window

properties.name: current panel
properties.description: The current panel in the Finder preferences window

suites.name: Legacy suite
suites.description: Operations formerly handled by the Finder, but now automatically delegated to other applications

classes.name: process
classes.description: A process running on this computer

properties.name: name
properties.description: the name of the process

properties.name: visible
properties.description: Is the process' layer visible?

properties.name: frontmost
properties.description: Is the process the frontmost process?

properties.name: file
properties.description: the file from which the process was launched

properties.name: file type
properties.description: the OSType of the file type of the process

properties.name: creator type
properties.description: the OSType of the creator of the process (the signature)

properties.name: accepts high level events
properties.description: Is the process high-level event aware (accepts open application, open document, print document, and quit)?

properties.name: accepts remote events
properties.description: Does the process accept remote events?

properties.name: has scripting terminology
properties.description: Does the process have a scripting terminology, i.e., can it be scripted?

properties.name: total partition size
properties.description: the size of the partition with which the process was launched

properties.name: partition space used
properties.description: the number of bytes currently used in the process' partition

classes.name: application process
classes.description: A process launched from an application file

properties.name: application file
properties.description: the application file from which this process was launched

classes.name: desk accessory process
classes.description: A process launched from a desk accessory file

properties.name: desk accessory file
properties.description: the desk accessory file from which this process was launched

suites.name: Type Definitions
suites.description: Definitions of records used in scripting the Finder

properties.name: window
properties.description: the window that would open if Finder preferences was opened

properties.name: icon view options
properties.description: the default icon view options

properties.name: list view options
properties.description: the default list view options

properties.name: column view options
properties.description: the column view options for all windows

properties.name: folders spring open
properties.description: Spring open folders after the specified delay?

properties.name: delay before springing
properties.description: the delay before springing open a container in seconds (from 0.167 to 1.169)

properties.name: desktop shows hard disks
properties.description: Hard disks appear on the desktop?

properties.name: desktop shows external hard disks
properties.description: External hard disks appear on the desktop?

properties.name: desktop shows removable media
properties.description: CDs, DVDs, and iPods appear on the desktop?

properties.name: desktop shows connected servers
properties.description: Connected servers appear on the desktop?

properties.name: new window target
properties.description: target location for a newly-opened Finder window

properties.name: folders open in new windows
properties.description: Folders open into new windows?

properties.name: folders open in new tabs
properties.description: Folders open into new tabs?

properties.name: new windows open in column view
properties.description: Open new windows in column view?

properties.name: all name extensions showing
properties.description: Show name extensions, even for items whose “extension hidden” is true?

classes.name: label
classes.description: (NOT AVAILABLE YET) A Finder label (name and color)

properties.name: name
properties.description: the name associated with the label

properties.name: index
properties.description: the index in the front-to-back ordering within its container

properties.name: color
properties.description: the color associated with the label

classes.name: icon family
classes.description: (NOT AVAILABLE YET) A family of icons

properties.name: large monochrome icon and mask
properties.description: the large black-and-white icon and the mask for large icons

properties.name: large 8 bit mask
properties.description: the large 8-bit mask for large 32-bit icons

properties.name: large 32 bit icon
properties.description: the large 32-bit color icon

properties.name: large 8 bit icon
properties.description: the large 8-bit color icon

properties.name: large 4 bit icon
properties.description: the large 4-bit color icon

properties.name: small monochrome icon and mask
properties.description: the small black-and-white icon and the mask for small icons

properties.name: small 8 bit mask
properties.description: the small 8-bit mask for small 32-bit icons

properties.name: small 32 bit icon
properties.description: the small 32-bit color icon

properties.name: small 8 bit icon
properties.description: the small 8-bit color icon

properties.name: small 4 bit icon
properties.description: the small 4-bit color icon

properties.name: arrangement
properties.description: the property by which to keep icons arranged

properties.name: icon size
properties.description: the size of icons displayed in the icon view

properties.name: shows item info
properties.description: additional info about an item displayed in icon view

properties.name: shows icon preview
properties.description: displays a preview of the item in icon view

properties.name: text size
properties.description: the size of the text displayed in the icon view

properties.name: label position
properties.description: the location of the label in reference to the icon

properties.name: background picture
properties.description: the background picture of the icon view

properties.name: background color
properties.description: the background color of the icon view

properties.name: text size
properties.description: the size of the text displayed in the column view

properties.name: shows icon
properties.description: displays an icon next to the label in column view

properties.name: shows icon preview
properties.description: displays a preview of the item in column view

properties.name: shows preview column
properties.description: displays the preview column in column view

properties.name: discloses preview pane
properties.description: discloses the preview pane of the preview column in column view

properties.name: calculates folder sizes
properties.description: Are folder sizes calculated and displayed in the window?

properties.name: shows icon preview
properties.description: displays a preview of the item in list view

properties.name: icon size
properties.description: the size of icons displayed in the list view

properties.name: text size
properties.description: the size of the text displayed in the list view

properties.name: sort column
properties.description: the column that the list view is sorted on

properties.name: uses relative dates
properties.description: Are relative dates (e.g., today, yesterday) shown in the list view?

classes.name: column
classes.description: a column of a list view

properties.name: index
properties.description: the index in the front-to-back ordering within its container

properties.name: name
properties.description: the column name

properties.name: sort direction
properties.description: The direction in which the window is sorted

properties.name: width
properties.description: the width of this column

properties.name: minimum width
properties.description: the minimum allowed width of this column

properties.name: maximum width
properties.description: the maximum allowed width of this column

properties.name: visible
properties.description: is this column visible

classes.name: alias list
classes.description: A list of aliases. Use ‘as alias list’ when a list of aliases is needed (instead of a list of file system item references).
